about_the_game:
Get ready to take your games to the next level with this awesome new pack from Sonancy Designs!

A collection of 1-3 minute tracks for RPGs, JRPGs and adventure games covering all kinds of different situations including battles, towns, cities, dungeons, caves, forests and more!

FEATURES:

* 20 BGM for royalty-free use
* mp3 / m4a / wav / ogg formats included
* Music for dungeon battles, boss battles and more!
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

1. Adventure, Here I Come!
2. Blades Up!
3. Clash of the Forge
4. Colosseum War
5. Evidaan Fields
6. Gilgame, The Bone King
7. Heaven’s Gate War
8. Jungle Temple Tapawei-fi
9. Katokau Village
10. Lonely Desert
11. Of The Dark
12. Soul’s Less Tavern
13. The Colosseum Gates
14. The Dark Town of Daefell
15. The Dreary Desert
16. The King of Oszhova
17. The Temple of Hali-de
18. They’re Chasing From Above!
19. War of the Sky Army
20. Yawmouth Tomb

Art by Hirosekou! Twitter: @hirosekoudesu
